library.name: A Comprehensive Bibliography on Syriac Studies

bib: Gignoux, Philippe. “Titres et fonctions religieuses sasanides d’après les sources syriaques hagiographiques.” In From Hecataeus to al-Ḫuwārizmï: Bactrian, Pahlavi, Sogdian, Persian, Sanskrit, Syriac, Arabic, Chinese, Greek, and Latin Sources for the History of Pre-Islamic Central Asia, edited by Janos Harmatta, 191–203.
